global.title_end_free_trial: All good things come to an end
global.subtitle_end_free_trial: You've reached the end of your trial!
global.first_description_end_free_trial: Your free 15-day trial period on Lengow has now expired. We know that it is sad news, but the best is yet to come! We sincerely hope Lengow has helped you improve your business.
global.second_description_end_free_trial: Your account will be suspended until you purchase a new subscription. All existing distributions and importations will also be suspended.
global.third_description_end_free_trial: Don't forget that trial accounts are deleted 30 days after the end of the trial period. Make sure to subscribe so you do not lose the work you've done building channels.
global.upgrade_account_button: It's ok, I'm ready to subscribe!

contact.find_answer: You can also find answers in our

order.report_sent_to: All reports will be sent to
order.no_report_sent: No order issue reports will be sent by mail.
order.no_order_title: The best is yet to come!
order.no_order_description: Your products have great visibility and your sales are about to prosper!
order.debug_warning_message: You are in Debug Mode. You can import orders, but no interaction with Lengow is possible

filter.search_placeholder: Search by order id or customer name...

action_button.action: Action sent to the marketplace did not work
action_button.import: Order hasn't been imported into Shopware
action_button.no_error_message: Unidentified error, please contact Lengow's support team for more information

order_tab.title: Lengow order detail page
order_tab.not_lengow_order: This order is not from Lengow
order_tab.not_follow_by_lengow: Due to a reimportation, this order is not tracked by Lengow
order_tab.check_synchronize_action: Do you really want to synchronize the order?
order_tab.check_cancel_and_reimport: Re-importing the order will set the status of this one as Lengow-Technical-Error and create a new one in your back office, are you sure ?

lengow_main_setting.label: Main settings
lengow_main_setting.description:
Below you will find your Lengow login details.
Account ID, Access Token and Secret Token are automatically completed at your first connection : please do not change them.

account.label: Account ID
account.description: Your Lengow account ID. Please do not change it.

access.label: Access Token
access.description: Your access token. Please do not change it.

secret.label: Secret Token
secret.description: Your secret token. Please do not change it.

enable.label: Enable shop
enable.description: Enable shop to work with Lengow

catalog.label: Catalogues ID
catalog.description:
Your catalogues ID to import orders.
Separate them by ' ; '

ip_enable.label: Enable authorisation by IP
ip_enable.description: Enable this option if you want your export to be secured by IP. By default, your export is secured by a unique key.

ip.label: Authorised IPs
ip.description:
Authorise IP to get access to your export feed.
Separate them ' ; '

tracking_enable.label: Enable Lengow tracking
tracking_enable.description: This tracker allows you to retrieve order statistics generated on your site directly in Lengow.

tracking_id.label: Tracker Product ID
tracking_id.description: The name of the unique identifier entered in the Lengow

timezone.label: Timezone
timezone.description: Choose your corresponding timezone, please choose wisely as this timezone is used when importing orders from Lengow API

lengow_export_setting.label: Export settings
lengow_export_setting.description: Define the settings to create your feed.

disabled_products.label: Export inactive products
disabled_products.description: Enable this option if you want to export inactive products

lengow_selection.label: Export specific products only
lengow_selection.description: Activate this option if you do not want to export all of your avaible products. Then select your products one by one.

shipping.label: Default shipping method
shipping.description: Select the default shipping method to calculate shipping costs

lengow_import_setting.label: Import settings
lengow_import_setting.description: All your orders are centralized in your Lengow platform : choose here if you want to synchronize and import your orders in your Shopware backoffice. It will also decrease your products stock in your backoffice

ship_mp_enabled.label: Import orders shipped by marketplaces
ship_mp_enabled.description: Use this option to import order shipped by the marketplace

decrease_stock.label: Decrease my stock with the orders shipped by marketplaces
decrease_stock.description: Use this option to take into account your orders sent by marketplaces on your stock in your Shopware backoffice

shipping.label: Default shipping method
shipping.description: Select the default shipping method that you would like to apply to your orders

import_days.label: Synchronize all orders updated since
import_days.description: Choose a number of days (Max 10 days)

debug_mode.label: Activate Debug Mode
debug_mode.description: Use Debug Mode for testing and to simulate fictitious orders. Please note that you have to activate this setting on your pre-production server ONLY

report_mail_enabled.label: I would like to be notified when there are issues regarding order importation

currency_conversion_title.label: Convert the currency of your order
currency_conversion_title.description: All orders imported into Shopware will be automatically converted into the currency you've selected in Lengow

import_btob.label: Enable import of B2B orders without tax
import_btob.description: Activate this option to import B2B orders without tax

checklist.title: Checklist
checklist.curl_message: Lengow needs the CURL PHP extension
checklist.curl_help: The CURL extension is not installed or enabled in your PHP installation
checklist.simple_xml_message: Lengow needs the SimpleXML PHP extension
checklist.simple_xml_help: The SimpleXML extension is not installed or enabled in your PHP installation
checklist.json_php_message: Lengow needs the JSON PHP extension
checklist.json_php_help: The JSON extension is not installed or enabled in your PHP installation
checklist.checksum_help: Some files have been changed by the customer

plugin.title: Plugin information
plugin.write_permission: Read and write permission from media folder

export.feed_url: Export URL for this sales channel
export.total_product_number: Products available in the sales channel
export.exported_product_number: Products exported in the sales channel

checksum.title: File Checksum integrity
checksum.file_not_exists: checkmd5.csv file is not available. Checking is impossible!

log.title: Log Files
log.description: Find all the maintenance logs below (imported orders, errors reports...). They will be recorded here for 20 days.
